definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: Trampling a ground every varieties grinds to test a training information.
sentences.chinese: 踐踏一地的各類研考培訓信息。

definition: to sit an entrance exam for a graduate program

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to sit for the second round of a two-stage exam
to recommend sb for postgraduate studies/to admit for postgraduate studies without taking the entrance exam
to advertise an entrance examination for an academic institution (old)
exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
